DMSScript.Name: IncreasePBS
DMSScript.Description: A DataMiner Automation script to manage PBS values of tasks in a Task Manager element. Filters tasks by state and updates PBS based on predefined rules, with safeguards to prevent system overload. (source: https://github.com/jaklke/SLC_AS_TaskManager_IncreasePBS)
DMSScript.Author: Jan-Klaas Kesteloot
